text: Simply the Best 18 Poprad was produced by World Kickboxing Network in terms of kickboxing series Simply the Best, on March 16, 2018, at Aréna Poprad in Poprad, Slovakia. ==Background== The event marked the return of kickboxing world championship to Slovakia. In the main event the protegee of Greg Tony French Dylan Colin took a unanimous decision against Slovakian Vladimir Idranyi, winning WKN World super middleweight title. Slovakian Samuel Hadzima took the revenge by decision against Belgian Tarik Mahillon , after their original bout at Simply the Best 17 Farciennes in November 2017, when Belgian fighter who took the win via first-round TKO (Doctor's stoppage) due to cut received by Hadzima. Erik Matejovsky won WKN Slovakian light heavyweight title when he defeated Jozef Kolodzej by decision. "Slovakian Giant" Tomas Mozny was expected to face Greek heavyweight Christos Soulas, following his unanimous decision win against Czech Daniel Skvor at GLORY 51 Rotterdam, but was forced to withdraw due to injury. ==Results== The fight card included ten match ups with kickboxing, boxing and MMA bouts featured on the program.
